subject: Soccer
English Language
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A new academic paper suggests that the word soccer began in Britain and was used there happily until at least the 1970s, even as a spirited debate over the sport’s name endures.
snippet: A new academic paper suggests that the word soccer began in Britain and was used there happily until at least the 1970s, even as a spirited debate over the sport’s name endures.
